Package org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.jdbc

Provides a processor that writes audit events to a JDBC database, with the processor managing the connection pool.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractJdbcProcessor
    This processors persists events to a JDBC database.
    JdbcDsProcessor
    This processors persists events to a JDBC database using a connection obtained from a database connection pool that is managed outside of this library.
    JdbcJndiProcessor
    This processors persists events to a JDBC database using a JNDI connection.
    JdbcPoolProcessor
    This processors persists events to a JDBC database using a configurable connection pool.
    JdbcProperties
    This class specifies properties specific to a JDBC Processor, independent on the underlying database connection technology (e.g.

Package org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.jdbc Description

Provides a processor that writes audit events to a JDBC database, with the processor managing the connection pool.
